0.9.0.name: wordpress/post-as-guest
0.9.0.description:
Creates as simple form for guests with a shortcode. New posts by guests will go to a waiting queue (review). Admins can simple check new posts content and approve / delete or edit these posts.

Features:

Creates a simple form with a shortcode. Ajax in Frontend and Backend. Localization Ready

Documentation

Basic example: Simple insert [post-as-guest] shortcode in a page for the form to be displayed. Change settings in WP Admin.

Support

Support Forum @ powie.de
